title.rendered: Gulshan group marks a legacy of excellence

content.rendered:
A glistening legacy spanning over the past three decades, Gulshan has established itself as an epitome of excellence. Conceptualized from a foundational thought of providing comfortable housing for residents, Gulshan has now emerged as a game-changer in the real estate landscape.

Gulshan Group is a man’s journey of building an empire by shaping innovation in the real estate sector with its unparalleled and unique offerings in the market. He envisioned real estate by introducing value to the customers’ existing needs, however small it may be.

On his initial stride to build a home for his family, he was faced with the same problems as an existing lot of customers, he empathized with them, which led to the creation of a brand like Gulshan Group in 1989.

Now widely recognized as a pioneering force in the real estate industry. Gulshan introduced the market to houses with premium living and a smaller price tag.

Building homes for 6000 families stretched over 4.5 lac sq. mt across 11 projects for the past 32 years has been a long-standing testament to Gulshan Group’s success. Gulshan Group’s innovative endeavors are a result of constantly evolving ideology to bring change within our lifestyles.

With an array of projects in line, this year marks a milestone for Gulshan as they offer possession of 1,888 units in their two most promising projects, Gulshan Botnia (764 units) and Gulshan Bellina (1124 units), and offering ready for fit-out spaces at the first-ever commercial landscape, Gulshan One29.

Gulshan One29 is the first commercial project by Gulshan Group. Located at the center of a residential and IT hub, One29 comes with a temperature-regulated environment to provide you a cozy ambiance and amenities like an Amphitheatre, a six-screen multiplex theatre, state of the art office spaces, a food court, retail outlets, and much more.

The luxury project of the year, Gulshan Dynasty, is a project intertwining wellness with luxury. With inbuilt amenities to facilitate your physical, mental, social, and environmental well-being. Dynasty is ahead of its time. It scales a rooftop recreation center and a private theatre with a high-end community club and 7 tier security system. In addition, Gulshan Dynasty is the only green residential project with 76% greens at the heart of sector 144 and all of Noida.

A paradise in Sector 144 Noida Expressway, Botnia is a 2&3 BHK residential unit packed with new-age amenities that promote digital living like Society App and Home Konnect.In addition,  Botnia offers premium concierge services, neoclassical facades, and a clubhouse, all in a centralized location.

Gulshan Bellina has redefined beautiful homes with extraordinary architecture. It offers ready-to-move-in 2 and 3 BHK units in Greater Noida West with features like an AC Unisex Beauty Salon, Coffee Shop, Kid’s Play-pan, In- Compound OPD, provision for indoor games, and a luxurious swimming pool.

Gulshan has come a long way, as our director, Ms. Yukti Nagpal, a new age realty leader, who continued envisioning the new in real estate and changed its dynamics by taking a step further, simply by having the courage to challenge the ordinary.
